product_name: Merrell Aquaterra Sprite Mary Jane Water Shoes - Girls'
long_description: If there's a puddle, your child will find it! With the cute and comfortable Merrell Aquaterra Sprite Mary Jane Water Shoes for girls, that's perfectly ok. Water-friendly materials are made for jumping in and out all day. Strobel construction offers flexibility and comfort. Leather, synthetic and mesh upper; breathable mesh lining. Rip-and-stick strap for a quick, secure fit. Breathable mesh lining and removable EVA footbeds are treated with AEGIS(R) antimicrobial solution to help fend off odors. Merrell Aquaterra Sprite Mary Jane Water Shoes have grippy, nonmarking rubber outsoles.
short_description: If there's a puddle, your child will find it! With the cute and comfortable Merrell Aquaterra Sprite Mary Jane Water Shoes for girls, that's perfectly ok.
